## [See Also](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSMatrixDescriptor/matrices#see-also)

### [Properties](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSMatrixDescriptor/matrices#Properties)

[`var rows: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdescriptor/rows)The number of rows in the matrix.[`var columns: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdescriptor/columns)The number of columns in the matrix.[`var dataType: MPSDataType`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdescriptor/datatype)The type of the values in the matrix.[`enum MPSDataType`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsdatatype)A value to specify a type of data.[`var rowBytes: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdescriptor/rowbytes)The stride, in bytes, between corresponding elements of consecutive rows in the matrix.[`var matrixBytes: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdescriptor/matrixbytes)
